I could float away on this snow
its crackling into the fireplace
falling in through the flu
and the draw just barely
turns and stirs the hair on my arms
cannot be disturbed
slow falling of standstill
bringing transport to its knees
not yet that cold
as it stings against my skin
could I float away on the updrafts and settle 
just far enough to be indistinguishable
from everything else
a bare woman shaped
frosting bump
somewhere on the lawn

Why is it that prose only seems to happen when its cold outside? I feel like I dry up when the air gets warm and humid.......

Overture

We sang a song this morning
my voice doesnt carry
but her voice sounds like Bette Davis
as a child and we laughed 
her mirth caught from mine
her swallowed soprano about a hag
named magdelina

We sang a song last night
your bass and my alto in
a smile that caught somewhere 
in a laugh of a joke
that only we would understand
little secrets mortar the
gaps of history we overcame

There was a chorus this afternoon
small voices and large in 
a strangled effort born of a dream
to teach our children music of our history
but the eldest was right
that decade just produced bad sounds
and a lot of hair
so we sang the Beatles instead

It was the Panjian that made me stop
transfixed and stuck
when The bronze, out of context in its spot
a place of standing without pretext for appreciation
but I understood
the embrace was no longer a sight of longing
but a gentle kneading and reviving of a feeling
fallen
comprehension of the embrace
I know that caress
the hand cradling waves of auburn
a hand resting gently while all other concious 
being is sharp focused on the touch elsewhere
a realization that somewhere
I had already fallen and was in deep understanding
of a passion of my own
reflected in anothers eyes from fifty years ago
caught
knowing the artist understood, rahter than desired.
Knowing what it felt 
to satiate on familiar and adored rather 
than to only hunger

Missing you
missing you not
missing you 
missing you not
missing you 
missing you not
I need a fucking
ocean liner filled with napalm 
to torch this goddamned field of
daisies.
I cant take the dependancy
of my own heart 
to keep beating out a cadence

There are moments
when we are all tempted to bitch about the cold

It feels like thaw in here, total unfettered thaw. Questionable 

I am sorting
manga drawing manuals 
camera film developed and not
change
projects half finished
and I wonder about the creative that is 
lacking these months
why is it I can only
write and create when there is thaw

Instead is it 40 below and there is a lover in my bed
things are different now
the creation is still stilted.
Busy with learning another form 
of art 
standing upright from 
the reactions of the block
my reach is only so far
hes not what they all expected
backlash.

creating is stilted when
one fights to not be abused
or to be protected 
from different angles
the side that protects the attacker and the
side berating the protector was not a complication 
that I expected out of anyone but the 
women I counsel
the bitter irony to be the victim
and not the healer.

Space heater at my feet
changes again that sit
on my skeletal stature
chill I can't loose.

I suppose the confusion
will never really abate
but biting my tounge
tastes like spoons
or warm blank
my own blood tastes like nothing

Would you bother
seeing that self injury
or is it entirely slippage
of words

clicking
struggle for a smooth 
transition

he sees his wife every
six months of every year and 
during these six months he tells me all they do is fight and I have 
to ask him if the six months away is good
then and he tells me that it is funny
because when he is here 
driving his cab
she tells him to come
home
now right now
not in a month, and when they are together he leaves to drive his 
white cab
and I notice he is taking me the long way to government square
he tells me that when he 
goes to leave that she tells him
never to call again
but she always picks up the phone
he tells me that he is fifty four years old and is 
wife is quite a bit
quite a great deal younger than he is
he says quite a bit a lot 
thirty four
and diffucult and headstrong and
only wantes the best
he is a cabbie and calls every other week at
78 cents a minute he 
tells me
and brings her money and clothes
and flies home every six months to see her and keep 
his visa valid and why
he asks me
are women always so diffucult?
I laughingly tell him its because we are always
right and deserve it.
And he and I laugh and laugh together his
bright smile in the rearview
and I ask him if he will ever go home forever
or bring his wide here to be near him and his 
smile fades and he tells me flat
no
no he will never bring her here
we would hate it he tells me
and she would see that the very best that I send
her is not the very best here 
and than what would i do?
Be a cabbie in Nigeria?
And he laughs quite a bit as I pay my fare and bumble into the street

someday
